Reviews.Title: A very good camera
Reviews.Author: Bryan MacKinnon
Reviews.Content: With GPS and wireless, this is the future of cameras and many electronics. It is easy to use and takes very good quality photos for a compact. And of course it has GPS and Wifi/Bluetooth.  The touchscreen is large and is very easy to use (the easiest I've ever used).I'd like to give this a 4.5 stars rating since the issues I had with it are minor: 1) the GPS can be a bit slow getting the initial fix and 2) the touchscreen is a bit sensitive sometimes causing it to bring up menus when you don't want to, and 3) I have a preference for regular SD cards verses micro SD.I've had mine for 2 weeks and overall I really enjoy it and the my larger digital SLR (without GPS) is collecting dust on the shelf.

Reviews.Title: A JEWEL  AND  JOY.
Reviews.Author: A. C. Lima "NAGUAL MD"
Reviews.Content: A GREAT CAMERA.,WITH EVERYTHING YOU WILL NEED IN A TRIP.PROS-1-HAS THE BEST FEATURES OF ANY COMPACT CAMERA.2-PICTURE QUALITY GOOD.3-GPS-3 MINUTES TO START.,BE PATIENT.,IT GOES OUT IN SPACE TO THE SATS.4-ZOOM VERY DECENT.5-BACK SCREEN OF VERY GOOD QUALITY.6-TOUCH SCREEN GOOD.6-OPERATIONAL BUTTONS EASY TO USE AND INTUITIVE.COULD IMPROVE-1-NORMAL BATTERIES.2-WEATHER PROOF.3-BIGGER ZOOM.

Reviews.Title: Impossible to find replacement charger
Reviews.Author: D. Neubert
Reviews.Content: I used the Sumsung CL65 for a few weeks and liked it.  It was one of the first cameras with a big screen, GPS and Wifi.  However, I lost the charger somewhere.  I couldn't find a replacement.  I found a third party version on Amazon bought it, but it didn't fit.  Samsung does not sell replacement chargers.  No camera store, Wal*mart or Best Buy had one either.  I thought of buying a cheaper Samsung Camera just for the charger.  Well, this camera has been sitting in my useless electronic equipment drawer now for a year.  While not as good as the CL65, I trust my iPhone more.  I've lost chargers for it and can buy one anywhere - airports, abroad etc.

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: Claudio
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed with the short comings of this camera . The added features like Wi Fi  and Bluetooth do not work up to standards and neither are the so called connections to "social networks " . Not a particularly user friendly cam  , the quality of the picture is OK as far as you don't move too much. I do not recommended at all . A  very average camera with a big price .

Reviews.Title: Bluetooth Not Computer Compatible
Reviews.Author: John Garvin "JRG"
Reviews.Content: The Amazon and Samsung web sites clearly states this camera connects via Bluetooth to computers. This camera does NOT connect to either a new Mac nor a new PC via Bluetooth. I have been on the phone with Samsung technical support staff for a minimum of 3.5 hours and talked to at least 10 people. They contradict each other and have no a clue. I would totally avoid buying this camera!!!!Now after just over one year the camera has completely quit operating.
